jd: From: Krish Sankla, Panzer Solutions LLC krish.sankla@panzersolutions.com Reply to: krish.sankla@panzersolutions.com NOTE: NEED ONLY LOCAL Position: Python DeveloperLocation: Mount Laurel, NJ onsite 4 days/week $45/hr on C2C 5 - 6 years of strong Python Development and ScriptingMySQLGraph Algorithms & Modeling – Dijkstra, Breadth First Search, Depth First Search, A*LinuxBasic Network KnowledgeGeneral understanding of how routers workProtocols: BGP and IGPNetwork modeling tools: Cisco WAE or similar is a plusAbility to solve complex problems and break them down.
